Class DiscordBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • DiscordBot
  • public class DiscordBot
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Discord Bot class. Handles Javacord API specific message receiving and sending.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  DiscordBot.AvailableStates
      Available states of bot state machine.
